modification.id: Refactor Default Checkout Process - SOUK Store
modification.author: Rohit Batra

operation.add:
<script>
              $(document).ready(function()
              {
                  $('#btn_checkout').on('click', function(e)
                  {
                      e.stopPropagation();
                      e.preventDefault();
                      $('#btn_checkout').html("");
                      $('#btn_checkout').attr("disabled","disabled");
                      // Show preloader
                      $('#btn_checkout').html("Loading...");
                      // AJAX
                      $.ajax({
                        url: '<?php echo $ajax_url; ?>',
                        dataType: 'json',
                        type: 'post',
                        success: function (response) {
                            alert(response.alert_msg);
                            window.location.href = decodeURIComponent(response.redirect_url);
                         },
                        error: function(jqXhr, textStatus, errorThrown)
                        {
                            console.log(errorThrown);
                        }
                      });
                  });
              });
            </script>
